import React, {useState} from "react"; import image from "../assets/download.jpeg"; import Button from "@mui/material/Button"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../App.css"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useEffect } from "react"; function Navbar() { const state = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const [localStorageLength, setLength] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('productsLength'))) useEffect(() => { setLength(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('productsLength'))) }, []) return (

); } export default Navbar;
